text: Terres de Druance is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Lassy (the seat), Saint-Jean-le-Blanc and Saint-Vigor-des-Mézerets.Arrêté préfectoral 2 December 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Terres de Druance
